Title: Electronic Submission
Description: Bids will be received through an electronic procurement platform.

Title: Electronic Auction
Description: Bids will be received through an electronic auction platform.

Title: Written
Description: Bids will be received via written documents, delivered as hard copies, via generic e-mail systems, or some similar mechanism.

Title: In Person
Description: Bids will only be received if they are hand delivered at the time and place specified in submissionMethodDetails or attached documentation.
